segments.text: Doctor aapke dwara di gayi mahatvapurna jaankari ke liye bohot-bohot dhanyavaad. Mujhe pura vishwas hai
ki yeh discussion logon ko allergic rhinitis ke baare mein zyada samajh aur jaankari dega.
Apni respiratory health ka khayal rakhein, aur zarurat ho toh apne doctor se salah zaroor lein.
Swasth rahiye, aur khulkar saans lijiye!
